name: Fading Crown
description:
Rumour has it that if someone were to acquire three mythical flowers hidden in the land, they would stop aging. And so the king set on a quest to find these flowers, for he desired to remain young and powerful.

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Jump

X - Attack

C - Dash

Credits:

David Chico García

Daniel Martí Casanova

Pascual Gázquez Compán

Fer Gueler

Alejandro Moya
